section1.ecosystem_made_for: Ecosystem made for new generation developers pushing innovation behind blockchain application and software development

section2.bringing_the_new_heading: Bringing the new generation developers closer to build a community of innovation in the field of blockchain and software development
section2.codex_on_althash_subheading: Codex on Althash is a software company that specializes in creation of blockchain applications, programming, services (SaaS)

item1.heading: We started the journey in 2019
item1.content: The company was created in response to a growing community on Althash where developers needed an ecosystem to interact and communicate in.

item2.heading: CodexWalletBot on Telegram Launched
item2.content: CodexWalletBot allowed users in the Althash ecosystem to easily communicate with each other while simultaneously sending and receiving HTMLCoin and tokens.

item3.heading: Bringing the AltHash Community Together
item3.content: Through Codex forums and initiatives, the Althash community has gained a sense of community and growth amongst HTML's developers and users.

item4.heading: Promoting Blockchain development on Althash / HTML Coin
item4.content: The Codex Team contains members from the HTMLCoin community, as well as a few founding members of HTMLBunker.

section3.subheading: A community that believes in innovation
section3.content: The Codex mission is to continuously build an ecosystem of programmers and developers on Althash with focus on building value through utility. By on-boarding many skilled freelancers, we are able to introduce them to the HTMLCoin software as well as promote applicatory advancements for Codex on Althash.

item1.heading: Lightening Fast Transactions
item1.content: Sending HRC20 tokens takes just minutes. Using the 'CodexWalletBot' you can check your pending transactions as well as see your balance.

item2.heading: Tiny Transaction Fees
item2.content: With HTMLCoin’s current market valuation you can send hundreds of transactions for fractions of an HTML; practically free.

item3.heading: Based on HTMLCoin
item3.content: A secure blockchain that is entirely based on the smart contracts of Ethereum and the Bitcoin Core Network.

university.heading: Altash University
university.content: Althash University is a collaborative project between the Althash Core team and the Codex Core team. This FREE service aims to reach out to blockchain clubs across the world to partake in an initiative to engage in HTML blockchain and create apps using tokens from the ecosystem.

section1.A_blockchain_support: A Blockchain supporting CODEX and many other platforms like it.
section1.subheading: AltHash a Blockchain as a Service (BaaS) company focused on providing decentralized ledger and blockchain solutions to governments and large institutions throughout the world.

section2.althash_is_a: Althash is a Proof-of-Work/Proof-of-Stake hybrid blockchain with fast and secure transactions hybrid of Bitcoin and Ethereum technologies.

card1.heading: Security of Bitcoin
card1.content: Leveraging the security of the UTXO protocol with additional abstraction layers that provide further speed, additional security

card2.heading: Flexibility of Ethereum
card2.content: Blockchain with the flexibility of Virtual Machines with additional abstraction layers that provide further speed and functionality to the network.

section2.some_heading: HTML Coin has been used globally for many years

card3.heading: 8+ Years of Experience.
card3.content: By withstanding the test of time, HTML proves their resilience by having survived several bear markets and even a 51% attack.

card4.heading: True Worldwide team.
card4.content: Skilled professionals from 6 continents, having a predominant amount of developers based in Brasil and Africa.

section2.fueled_content: The cryptocurrency that powers the network, the Althash blockchain is able to provide a fast, efficient and reliable platform for secure and easy to use applications for institutions, businesses and individuals.

section4.subheading: Our AltHash community have made many great tokens including CODEX own CDEX tokens. Explore the tokens.

news1.title: BUNK
news1.content: HTMLBunker is the first exchange in the world totally dedicated to HTMLCoin with more than 30 top pairs. HTMLBunker arose from the concept and need to contribute to the HTMLCoin community and crypto community as a whole.

news2.title: XOLA
news2.content: A free-to-community project built using contract-oriented Solidity on the Althash platform. Designed to be a flexible, configurable, yet secure HRC20 Token Smart Contract with XOLA Protection Factor (Simulated Proof-of-Stake).

news3.title: Codex (CDEX)
news3.content: Codex token is used in the Codex ecosystem, primarily as an access token to VIP features on the Codex Wallet Bot.

section.an_initiative: An initiative of CODEX and Althash to nurture the potential talents in the emerging technologies and software development.
section.althash_strives: Althash strives to make this initiative a global, technological ‘blockchain -movement’ that attracts students of advanced coding expertise and backgrounds.
section.some_catchy: Some catchy heading related to University
section.by_interecting_with: By interacting with many developers that know how to create smart contracts. We are able to apply their skills to HTMLCoin and create high utility applications that will be applicable in everyday life. Tipping bots, payment systems, token reward programs are all examples of some of the creations that students can make from HTMLCoins smart contracting software.
section.this_initiative: This initiative will target blockchain clubs across the globe, particularly those at Universities in the United States. The program will allow students to take part in an internship- like program with Althash where they will create smart contracts using Solidity, and other coding languages like nodejs. Gifted HTMLCoin and CDEX token will be given to these clubs to assist in the creation of high- utility applications. This initiative will expand the horizons for each students developmental career as well as promote further their understanding of emerging software in the blockchain space.
section.card2: Althash will provide the members of your club for internship
section.card3: Interns can contribute and learn while building on Althash
section.card4: After completion interns will get the certificate $ Althash University and ranking
section.card5: Top performers will get the oppurtunity to work as an employee at Altash Community
section.upon_completion: Upon completion of the program, students will receive a course Certificate and an Althash intiative ‘ranking’.
section.highly_qualified: Highly qualified students will also be recognized by the program administrators and will be offered employment with Althash to create related applications down the road.

section2.register_headline: Register your organization for Althash University Program
section2.subheading: A community that believes in innovation
section2.place_message: Please mention anything that you would want us know

section1.latest_news: Latest news of the Codex Community!

section1.a_tip_bot: A tip bot on Telegram that is connected to the HTMLCoin blockchain, which allows users to have the capability of checking their balance, public address, and private key
section1.get_full: Get full functionality, weekly and monthly airdrops, lifetime membership and many more.

section2.first_product: Codex Wallet Bot was our first product.
section2.the_inspiration: The inspiration behind 'CodexWalletBot' came from replicating healthy ecosystems of other existing blockchains in the crypto space. Tip bots like, Seedit, Robominer, and Parjar have demonstrated the success of bringing users to the blockchain space via Social Media. By presenting users with a simple interface to send and receive HRC20 tokens on, it makes sending and receiving transactions more user friendly.
section2.what_you_can: What you can do with our bot
section2.card4: Check Balance, Public Address, and Private Key

section3.subheading: Become a VIP and get the full functionality of our bot including lifetime membership, daily airdrops, monthly airdrops, airdrop log, discounted listings, and many more future developments to come.
section3.hold: Become a VIP, if you hold
section3.the_monthly_airdrops: The monthly airdrops and daily airdrops are not intended as payment for being a VIP, but rather as a free distribution and gift to VIPs to use the software as well as future Codex builds. Neither daily airdrops nor monthly airdrops are guaranteed
